messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Join ‘Taste Talk’ for a Live Cooking Demo

Hi Emma,

I’m Jordan Blake, host of the “Taste Talk” podcast, where we explore the stories behind food trends and share hands‑on cooking experiences with our listeners. Our audience loves healthy, quick‑prep meals and we’ve noticed a strong interest in celebrity chefs who bring vibrant, approachable recipes to the table.

We’re planning an upcoming episode titled **“Live Cooking Demonstration: Health‑Focused Italian Cuisine.”** Given your award‑winning background on TVFood Network’s “Chef’s Table Italy,” and your expertise in creating flavorful yet health‑conscious pasta dishes, we believe you’d be the perfect guest to lead a live demonstration for our listeners.

The episode would be a 45‑minute recorded session where you’d walk us through a signature healthy Italian recipe, share tips on ingredient selection, and answer listener questions in real time. We’ll handle all technical logistics and promote the episode across our social channels, giving you great exposure to an engaged audience that’s eager for chef‑driven content.

Would you be interested in joining us? We’re flexible on dates and can work around your schedule.

Looking forward to the possibility of collaborating!

Warm regards,
Jordan Blake
Host, Taste Talk Podcast
jordan.blake@tastetalkpod.com

The pitch email for Emma Rossi is ready. You can copy the text above and send it to her at emma.rossi@chefmail.com. Let me know if you’d like me to adjust the email or if you’d prefer a pitch for a different chef.
